sourcesContent:
<template></template>
<script>
import { Howl, Howler } from "howler";
export default {
  name: "player",
  data() {
    return {
      Options: {
        src: "",
        loop: true,
        autoplay: true
      }
    };
  },
  created() {
      alert(this.$route.params.id)
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getMusicUrl;
    this.init;
  },
  methods: {
    init() {
      const sound = new Howl(this.Options);

      // Play the sound.
      sound.play();

      // Change global volume.
      Howler.volume(0.5);
    },
    getMusicUrl() {
      this.$http
        .get("/api/song/url", { params: { id: this.$route.params.id } })
        .then(response => {
          this.Options.src = response.data.url;

          console.log(this.Options);
        })
        .catch(error => {
          console.log("接口或处理逻辑出错");
        });
    }
  }
};
</script>
